articles.author: Aakash Molpariya
articles.title: Archaeologists Just Revealed A Rare Deadly Weapon Of First Americans Capable Of Taking Down Mastodons - Revyuh
articles.description: Interestingly, the bone used to make the point appears to have come from the leg of another mastodon and was deliberately shaped into the form of a
articles.content:
A group of scientists, guided by a Texas A&M professor, has uncovered the Manis bone projectile point as the earliest bone weapon found in the Americas, dating back to 13,900 years.
